ThingDef.label: meteorite generator
ThingDef.description: An ancient control unit for a network of weather-control satellites. This device has had certain failsafes bypassed; it is capable of causing a massive sky-rock disturbance, which will generate a meteorite at a chosen location. The weather network will detect this unauthorized intrusion and lock out the device after use, but the meteorite will be left to tumble to the earth normally.
